Introduction

Ha Sung Woon (or simply Sungwoon) is a South Korean singer under BPM Entertainment. He made his official debut in 2014 as a member of the boy group Hotshot. However, he became known for participating in Produce 101 Season 2, where he finished 11th place, allowing him to debut as a member of the project boy group Wanna One.

Following the conclusion of his Wanna One activities, Sungwoon made his solo debut on February 28, 2019, with the mini album "My Moment."

On November 2, 2021, both Sungwoon and Star Crew Entertainment announced that his exclusive 7-year contract with them expired on October 31, and he decided not to renew.

On December 24, 2021, it was announced that Sungwoon had signed an exclusive contract with BPM Entertainment.
